sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Col, Container, Image, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import { getProduct } from '../../api/products' import Moment from 'react-moment'; const ShowProductPage = () => { const { id } = useParams() const [product, setProduct] = useState({}); const [image, setImage] = useState({}); const fetchDataProduct = async () => { const resProduct = await getProduct(id) setImage(resProduct.image) setProduct(resProduct) } useEffect( () => { fetchDataProduct() }, []) return ( Data: {product.insertDate} Nome: {product.name} Prezzo: {product.price}{product.currency} Descrizione:

{product.description}

 Modifica ) } export default ShowProductPage
